thread.title: Great hotel & Service.
thread.title_full: Great hotel & Service. - Review of Mercure London Paddington Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Cdonnelly31
title: Great hotel & Service.
text:
Stayed on a recent visit to London, the hotel is lovely inside & staff were very helpful & chatty. A 5 minute walk to the tube station which is great. The guy on reception was extremely helpful & made dinner reservations for us & made recommendations on where to go.
The only thing I would say is a Â£25 charge was added to my account without my knowledge upon arrival, I was told this would be refunded but it was not.
I would definitely return on my next visit to the city.
